member.summary: Filters the list of suggestions based on starting text of the items.

member.summary: Filters the list of suggestions based on starting text of the items with case sensitive.

member.summary: Filters the list of suggestions from items that contains the user input.

member.summary: Filters the list of suggestions from items that contains the user input with case sensitive.

member.summary: Filters the list of suggestion from items that match exact text with user input

member.summary: Filters the list of suggestion from items that match exact text with user input with case sensitive

member.summary: Filters the list of suggestions based on end text of the items.
